Unfortunately, since the game has been made free it is impossible to have a nice game and have fun because cheaters are rulling this game nowadays. Valve anti cheating software is maybe one of the worst out there. And  another thing is, that when a have really nice games and I play well I get reported for nothing , my trust factor goes low and I have to play a few matches with cheaters before my trust factor goes up again. So , good job Valve ! The prime status means nothing it's always the same.
